content.prompt: The most controversial and divisive component of the Compromise of 1850 was the

choices.label: admittance of Missouri as a slave state and the establishment of the 36°30' line
passage of a tougher national fugitive slave act
admittance of Texas as a slave state
legislation permitted the surveying of a southern transcontinental railway line
